text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the day of Fuji Kiseki's debut.<n>Despite being a
newcomer, everyone is<n>expecting such great
things from her<n>that even I get put into the
spotlight as<n>her trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
To calm my nerves, she uses magic to<n>conjure a
piece of chocolate for me. Her<n>magic effective,
she gallantly heads off<n>to her race.
